text: sæma janatavagenma (apage dutayinva ovunta) saksi vasayen kændava tabagena, (ovunta “ma hæra, devivarun yayi oba aradhana karamin sitiya noveda, eyata ayat) obage sadhakayan gena enu” yayi api pavasana avasthavedi ovun boruvata manakkalpitava (deviyan yayi) pavasamin siti dæya siyalla ovunva athæra dama sængavi, satya (vu devatvaya) allah ek kenekutama niyata vasayenma ayitiya yanna ovun dæna ganu æta
